titles.title: Parent Drug Awareness Act

A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require that the labeling of drugs which are derived from materials from a human fetus shall include notice of the source of such materials and the labeling shall be made available to the consumer and the parent or guardian of the consumer.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 9/17/1987--Introduced. Parent Drug Awareness Act - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require that drugs derived from a human fetus be labeled accordingly.
